title: West Hollywood
name: BIN 8945
content: A European-style wine bar and bistro care of restaurateur David Haskell. The dark and inviting 35-seat caf√© features a six-stool bar and 13-foot wine cellar; they offer 80 wines by the glass. The cuisine is a blend of modern European emphasized with Caribbean and North African flavors; blackened catfish on risotto and jerk chicken with pineapple chutney are two tasty examples. There is a traditional five-course tasting menu, with the option of a wine pairing, for just under $100.
